001package com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.ycwcm;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.Gdx;
004import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color;
005import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL20;
006import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Mesh;
007import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture;
008import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttribute;
009import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttributes;
010import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch;
011import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion;
012import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram;
013import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Affine2;
014import com.badlogic.gdx.math.MathUtils;
015import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
016import com.badlogic.gdx.utils.NumberUtils;
017import com.github.tommyettinger.colorful.FloatColors;
018
019import java.nio.Buffer;
020
021/**
022 * A substitute for {@link com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch} that adds an additional attribute to store an
023 * extra color's worth of channels, used to modify the luma and chromatic channels of a color by multiplication (called
024 * the "tweak") while the primary color affects the color additively (just called the color, often drawn from
025 * {@link Palette} or generated with {@link FloatColors}).
026 * <br>
027 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 12/14/2019.
028 */
029public class ColorfulBatch implements Batch {
030    public static final int SPRITE_SIZE = 24;
031    public static final String TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE = "a_tweak";
032
033    private Mesh mesh;
034
035    private final float[] vertices;
036    private int idx = 0;
037    private Texture lastTexture = null;
038    private float invTexWidth = 0, invTexHeight = 0;
039
040    private boolean drawing = false;
041
042    private final Matrix4 transformMatrix = new Matrix4();
043    private final Matrix4 projectionMatrix = new Matrix4();
044    private final Matrix4 combinedMatrix = new Matrix4();
045
046    private boolean blendingDisabled = false;
047    private int blendSrcFunc = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
048    private int blendDstFunc = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
049    private int blendSrcFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
050    private int blendDstFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
051
052    private final ShaderProgram shader;
053    private ShaderProgram customShader = null;
054    private boolean ownsShader;
055
056    protected float color = Palette.GRAY;
057    private final Color tempColor = new Color(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1f);
058
059    /**
060     * A constant packed float that can be assigned to this ColorfulBatch's tweak with {@link #setTweak(float)} to make
061     * all of the tweak adjustments virtually imperceptible. When this is set as the tweak, it won't change the luma
062     * multiplier or luma contrast, and it won't change either chromatic value multiplier.
063     */
064    public static final float TWEAK_RESET = ColorTools.ycwcm(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
065    protected float tweak = TWEAK_RESET;
066
067    /** Number of render calls since the last {@link #begin()}. **/
068    public int renderCalls = 0;
069
070    /** Number of rendering calls, ever. Will not be reset unless set manually. **/
071    public int totalRenderCalls = 0;
072
073    /** The maximum number of sprites rendered in one batch so far. **/
074    public int maxSpritesInBatch = 0;
075
076    /** Constructs a new ColorfulBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, and the default shader.
077     * @see #ColorfulBatch(int, ShaderProgram) */
078    public ColorfulBatch() {
079        this(1000, null);
080    }
081
082    /** Constructs a ColorfulBatch with one buffer and the default shader.
083     * @see #ColorfulBatch(int, ShaderProgram)  */
084    public ColorfulBatch(int size) {
085        this(size, null);
086    }
087
088    /** Constructs a new ColorfulBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis
089     * point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with
090     * respect to the current screen resolution.
091     * <p>
092     * The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different than
093     * the ones expect for shaders set with {@link #setShader(ShaderProgram)}. See {@link #createDefaultShader()}.
094     * @param size The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 10922.
095     * @param defaultShader The default shader to use. This is not owned by the ColorfulBatch and must be disposed separately. */
096    public ColorfulBatch(int size, ShaderProgram defaultShader) {
097        // 65535 is max vertex index, so 65535 / 6 vertices per sprite = 10922 sprites max.
098        if (size > 10922) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can't have more than 10922 sprites per batch: " + size);
099
100        Mesh.VertexDataType vertexDataType = (Gdx.gl30 != null) ? Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexBufferObjectWithVAO : Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexArray;
101
102        mesh = new Mesh(vertexDataType, false, size * 4, size * 6,
103                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.Position, 2, ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE),
104                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE),
105                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.TextureCoordinates, 2, ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0"),
106                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE));
107
108        projectionMatrix.setToOrtho2D(0, 0, Gdx.graphics.getWidth(), Gdx.graphics.getHeight());
109
110        vertices = new float[size * SPRITE_SIZE];
111
112        int len = size * 6;
113        short[] indices = new short[len];
114        short j = 0;
115        for (int i = 0; i < len; i += 6, j += 4) {
116            indices[i] = j;
117            indices[i + 1] = (short)(j + 1);
118            indices[i + 2] = (short)(j + 2);
119            indices[i + 3] = (short)(j + 2);
120            indices[i + 4] = (short)(j + 3);
121            indices[i + 5] = j;
122        }
123        mesh.setIndices(indices);
124
125        if (defaultShader == null) {
126            shader = createDefaultShader();
127            ownsShader = true;
128        } else
129            shader = defaultShader;
130    }
131
132    /** Returns a new instance of the default shader used by ColorfulBatch for GL2 when no shader is specified. */
133    public static ShaderProgram createDefaultShader () {
134        String vertexShader = "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
135                + "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
136                + "attribute vec2 " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
137                + "attribute vec4 " + TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
138                + "uniform mat4 u_projTrans;\n" //
139                + "varying vec4 v_color;\n" //
140                + "varying vec4 v_tweak;\n" //
141                + "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" //
142                + "varying float v_lightFix;\n" //
143                + "\n" //
144                + "void main()\n" //
145                + "{\n" //
146                + "   v_color = " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
147                + "   v_color.a = v_color.a * (255.0/254.0);\n" //
148                + "   v_tweak = " + TWEAK_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
149                + "   v_tweak.a = pow(v_tweak.a * (255.0/254.0) + 0.5, 1.709);\n" //
150                + "   v_lightFix = 1.0 + pow(v_tweak.a, 1.41421356);\n" //
151                + "   v_texCoords = " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
152                + "   gl_Position =  u_projTrans * " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
153                + "}\n";
154        String fragmentShader =
155                "#ifdef GL_ES\n" +
156                        "#define LOWP lowp\n" +
157                        "precision mediump float;\n" +
158                        "#else\n" +
159                        "#define LOWP \n" +
160                        "#endif\n" +
161                        "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" +
162                        "varying LOWP vec4 v_color;\n" +
163                        "varying LOWP vec4 v_tweak;\n" +
164                        "varying float v_lightFix;\n" +
165                        "uniform sampler2D u_texture;\n" +
166                        "const vec3 bright = vec3(0.375, 0.5, 0.125);\n" +
167                        "void main()\n" +
168                        "{\n" +
169                        "   vec4 tgt = texture2D( u_texture, v_texCoords );\n" +
170                        "   vec3 ycc = vec3(\n" +
171                        "     (v_color.r - 0.5 + v_tweak.r * pow(dot(tgt.rgb, bright), v_tweak.a) * v_lightFix),\n" + // luma
172                        "     (v_color.g - 0.5 + (tgt.r - tgt.b) * v_tweak.g) * 2.0,\n" + // warmth
173                        "     (v_color.b - 0.5 + (tgt.g - tgt.b) * v_tweak.b) * 2.0);\n" + // mildness
174                        "   gl_FragColor = clamp(vec4(\n" +
175                        "     dot(ycc, vec3(1.0, 0.625, -0.5)),\n" + // back to red
176                        "     dot(ycc, vec3(1.0, -0.375, 0.5)),\n" + // back to green
177                        "     dot(ycc, vec3(1.0, -0.375, -0.5)),\n" + // back to blue
178                        "     v_color.a * tgt.a), 0.0, 1.0);\n" + // back to alpha and clamp
179                        "}";
180
181
182        ShaderProgram shader = new ShaderProgram(vertexShader, fragmentShader);
183        if (!shader.isCompiled()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Error compiling shader: " + shader.getLog());
184        return shader;
185    }
186
187    @Override
188    public void begin () {
189        if (drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.end must be called before begin.");
190        renderCalls = 0;
191
192        Gdx.gl.glDepthMask(false);
193        if (customShader != null)
194            customShader.bind();
195        else
196            shader.bind();
197        setupMatrices();
198
199        drawing = true;
200    }
201
202    @Override
203    public void end () {
204        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before end.");
205        if (idx > 0) flush();
206        lastTexture = null;
207        drawing = false;
208
209        GL20 gl = Gdx.gl;
210        gl.glDepthMask(true);
211        if (isBlendingEnabled()) gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
212    }
213
214    @Override
215    public void setColor (Color tint) {
216        color = tint.toFloatBits();
217    }
218
219    /**
220     * Sets the additive changes to the YCwCm color, as well as the multiplicative change to the alpha.
221     * @param lumaAdd additive luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
222     * @param warmAdd additive chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
223     * @param mildAdd additive chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
224     * @param alphaMul multiplicative alpha channel, from 0 to 1; 1.0 is neutral
225     */
226    @Override
227    public void setColor (float lumaAdd, float warmAdd, float mildAdd, float alphaMul) {
228        color = ColorTools.ycwcm(lumaAdd, warmAdd, mildAdd, alphaMul);
229    }
230
231    public void setColor (final float color) {
232        setPackedColor(color);
233    }
234
235    public void setIntColor(final int color) {
236        this.color = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat(Integer.reverseBytes(color & -2));
237    }
238
239    public void setIntColor(int luma, int warm, int mild, int alpha) {
240        color = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat((alpha << 24 & 0xFE000000)
241                | (mild << 16 & 0xFF0000) | (warm << 8 & 0xFF00) | (luma & 0xFF));
242    }
243
244    @Override
245    public void setPackedColor (final float color) {
246        this.color = color;
247    }
248
249    @Override
250    public Color getColor () {
251        final int intBits = NumberUtils.floatToRawIntBits(color);
252        Color color = tempColor;
253        color.r = (intBits & 0xff) / 255f;
254        color.g = ((intBits >>> 8) & 0xff) / 255f;
255        color.b = ((intBits >>> 16) & 0xff) / 255f;
256        color.a = ((intBits >>> 24) & 0xff) / 255f;
257        return color;
258    }
259
260    @Override
261    public float getPackedColor () {
262        return color;
263    }
264
265    /**
266     * Sets the multiplicative changes to the YCwCm color, along with the contrast.
267     * @param lumaMul multiplicative luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
268     * @param warmMul multiplicative chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
269     * @param mildMul multiplicative chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
270     * @param contrast affects how lightness changes, from 0 (low contrast, cloudy look) to 1 (high contrast, sharpened look); 0.5 is neutral
271     */
272    public void setTweak (float lumaMul, float warmMul, float mildMul, float contrast) {
273        tweak = ColorTools.ycwcm(lumaMul, warmMul, mildMul, contrast);
274    }
275
276    /**
277     * Sets the tweak using a single packed YCwCm float.
278     * @see #setTweak(float, float, float, float)
279     * @param tweak a packed YCwCm float, with contrast instead of alpha
280     */
281    public void setTweak (final float tweak) {
282        this.tweak = tweak;
283    }
284    
285    public float getTweak () {
286        return tweak;
287    }
288    
289    public void setIntTweak(final int tweak) {
290        this.tweak = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat(Integer.reverseBytes(tweak & -2));
291    }
292
293    public void setIntTweak(int luma, int warm, int mild, int contrast) {
294        tweak = NumberUtils.intBitsToFloat((contrast << 24 & 0xFE000000)
295                | (mild << 16 & 0xFF0000) | (warm << 8 & 0xFF00) | (luma & 0xFF));
296    }
297    /**
298     * A convenience method that sets both the color (with {@link #setColor(float)}) and the tweak (with
299     * {@link #setTweak(float)}) at the same time.
300     * @param color the additive components and alpha, as a packed float
301     * @param tweak the multiplicative components and contrast, as a packed float
302     */
303    public void setTweakedColor(final float color, final float tweak) {
304        setColor(color);
305        setTweak(tweak);
306    }
307    /**
308     * A convenience method that sets both the color (with {@link #setColor(float, float, float, float)}) and the tweak
309     * (with {@link #setTweak(float, float, float, float)}) at the same time.
310     * @param lumaAdd additive luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
311     * @param warmAdd additive chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
312     * @param mildAdd additive chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
313     * @param alphaMul multiplicative alpha channel, from 0 to 1; 1.0 is neutral
314     * @param lumaMul multiplicative luma channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
315     * @param warmMul multiplicative chromatic warmth channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
316     * @param mildMul multiplicative chromatic mildness channel, from 0 to 1; 0.5 is neutral
317     * @param contrast affects how lightness changes, from 0 (low contrast, cloudy look) to 1 (high contrast, sharpened look); 0.5 is neutral
318     */
319    public void setTweakedColor (final float lumaAdd, final float warmAdd,
320                                 final float mildAdd, final float alphaMul,
321                                 final float lumaMul, final float warmMul,
322                                 final float mildMul, final float contrast) {
323        setColor(lumaAdd, warmAdd, mildAdd, alphaMul);
324        setTweak(lumaMul, warmMul, mildMul, contrast);
325    }
326
327    @Override
328    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height, float scaleX,
329                      float scaleY, float rotation, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
330        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
331
332        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
333
334        if (texture != lastTexture)
335            switchTexture(texture);
336        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
337            flush();
338
339        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
340        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
341        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
342        float fx = -originX;
343        float fy = -originY;
344        float fx2 = width - originX;
345        float fy2 = height - originY;
346
347        // scale
348        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
349            fx *= scaleX;
350            fy *= scaleY;
351            fx2 *= scaleX;
352            fy2 *= scaleY;
353        }
354
355        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
356        final float p1x = fx;
357        final float p1y = fy;
358        final float p2x = fx;
359        final float p2y = fy2;
360        final float p3x = fx2;
361        final float p3y = fy2;
362        final float p4x = fx2;
363        final float p4y = fy;
364
365        float x1;
366        float y1;
367        float x2;
368        float y2;
369        float x3;
370        float y3;
371        float x4;
372        float y4;
373
374        // rotate
375        if (rotation != 0) {
376            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
377            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
378
379            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
380            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
381
382            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
383            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
384
385            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
386            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
387
388            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
389            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
390        } else {
391            x1 = p1x;
392            y1 = p1y;
393
394            x2 = p2x;
395            y2 = p2y;
396
397            x3 = p3x;
398            y3 = p3y;
399
400            x4 = p4x;
401            y4 = p4y;
402        }
403
404        x1 += worldOriginX;
405        y1 += worldOriginY;
406        x2 += worldOriginX;
407        y2 += worldOriginY;
408        x3 += worldOriginX;
409        y3 += worldOriginY;
410        x4 += worldOriginX;
411        y4 += worldOriginY;
412
413        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
414        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
415        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
416        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
417
418        if (flipX) {
419            float tmp = u;
420            u = u2;
421            u2 = tmp;
422        }
423
424        if (flipY) {
425            float tmp = v;
426            v = v2;
427            v2 = tmp;
428        }
429
430        final float color = this.color;
431        final float tweak = this.tweak;
432        final int idx = this.idx;
433        vertices[idx] = x1;
434        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
435        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
436        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
437        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
438        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
439
440        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
441        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
442        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
443        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
444        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
445        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
446
447        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
448        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
449        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
450        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
451        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
452        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
453
454        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
455        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
456        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
457        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
458        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
459        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
460        this.idx = idx + 24;
461    }
462
463    @Override
464    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth,
465                      int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
466        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
467
468        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
469
470        if (texture != lastTexture)
471            switchTexture(texture);
472        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
473            flush();
474
475        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
476        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
477        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
478        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
479        final float fx2 = x + width;
480        final float fy2 = y + height;
481
482        if (flipX) {
483            float tmp = u;
484            u = u2;
485            u2 = tmp;
486        }
487
488        if (flipY) {
489            float tmp = v;
490            v = v2;
491            v2 = tmp;
492        }
493
494        final float color = this.color;
495        final float tweak = this.tweak;
496        final int idx = this.idx;
497        vertices[idx] = x;
498        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
499        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
500        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
501        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
502        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
503
504        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
505        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
506        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
507        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
508        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
509        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
510
511        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
512        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
513        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
514        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
515        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
516        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
517
518        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
519        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
520        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
521        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
522        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
523        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
524        this.idx = idx + 24;
525    }
526
527    @Override
528    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight) {
529        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
530
531        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
532
533        if (texture != lastTexture)
534            switchTexture(texture);
535        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
536            flush();
537
538        final float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
539        final float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
540        final float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
541        final float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
542        final float fx2 = x + srcWidth;
543        final float fy2 = y + srcHeight;
544
545        final float color = this.color;
546        final float tweak = this.tweak;
547        final int idx = this.idx;
548        vertices[idx] = x;
549        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
550        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
551        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
552        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
553        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
554
555        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
556        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
557        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
558        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
559        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
560        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
561
562        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
563        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
564        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
565        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
566        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
567        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
568
569        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
570        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
571        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
572        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
573        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
574        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
575        this.idx = idx + 24;
576    }
577
578    @Override
579    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, float u, float v, float u2, float v2) {
580        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
581
582        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
583
584        if (texture != lastTexture)
585            switchTexture(texture);
586        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
587            flush();
588
589        final float fx2 = x + width;
590        final float fy2 = y + height;
591
592        final float color = this.color;
593        final float tweak = this.tweak;
594        final int idx = this.idx;
595        vertices[idx] = x;
596        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
597        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
598        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
599        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
600        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
601
602        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
603        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
604        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
605        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
606        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
607        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
608
609        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
610        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
611        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
612        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
613        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
614        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
615
616        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
617        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
618        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
619        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
620        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
621        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
622        this.idx = idx + 24;
623    }
624
625    @Override
626    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y) {
627        draw(texture, x, y, texture.getWidth(), texture.getHeight());
628    }
629
630    @Override
631    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
632        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
633
634        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
635
636        if (texture != lastTexture)
637            switchTexture(texture);
638        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
639            flush();
640
641        final float fx2 = x + width;
642        final float fy2 = y + height;
643        final float u = 0;
644        final float v = 1;
645        final float u2 = 1;
646        final float v2 = 0;
647
648        final float color = this.color;
649        final float tweak = this.tweak;
650        final int idx = this.idx;
651        vertices[idx] = x;
652        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
653        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
654        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
655        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
656        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
657
658        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
659        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
660        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
661        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
662        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
663        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
664
665        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
666        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
667        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
668        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
669        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
670        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
671
672        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
673        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
674        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
675        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
676        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
677        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
678        this.idx = idx + 24;
679    }
680
681    /**
682     * This is very different from the other overloads in this class; it assumes the float array it is given is in the
683     * format libGDX uses to give to SpriteBatch, that is, in groups of 20 floats per sprite. ColorfulBatch uses 24
684     * floats per sprite, to add tweak per color, so this does some conversion.
685     * @param texture the Texture being drawn from; usually an atlas or some parent Texture with lots of TextureRegions
686     * @param spriteVertices not the same format as {@link #vertices} in this class; should have a length that's a multiple of 20
687     * @param offset where to start drawing vertices from {@code spriteVertices}
688     * @param count how many vertices to draw from {@code spriteVertices} (20 vertices is one sprite)
689     */
690    @Override
691    public void draw (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
692        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
693
694        count = (count / 5) * 6;
695        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
696        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
697        if (texture != lastTexture)
698            switchTexture(texture);
699        else {
700            remainingVertices -= idx;
701            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
702                flush();
703                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
704            }
705        }
706        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
707        final float tweak = this.tweak;
708
709        ////old way, breaks when libGDX code expects SPRITE_SIZE to be 20
710        //System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
711        ////new way, thanks mgsx
712        for (int s = offset, v = idx, i = 0; i < copyCount; i += 6) {
713            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
714            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
715            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
716            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
717            vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
718            vertices[v++] = tweak;
719        }
720        idx += copyCount;
721        count -= copyCount;
722        while (count > 0) {
723            offset += (copyCount / 6) * 5;
724            flush();
725            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
726            ////old way, breaks when libGDX code expects SPRITE_SIZE to be 20
727            //System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
728            ////new way, thanks mgsx
729            for (int s = offset, v = 0, i = 0; i < copyCount; i += 6) {
730                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
731                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
732                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
733                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
734                vertices[v++] = spriteVertices[s++];
735                vertices[v++] = tweak;
736            }
737            idx += copyCount;
738            count -= copyCount;
739        }
740    }
741
742    /**
743     * Meant for code that uses ColorfulBatch specifically and can set an extra float (for the color tweak) per vertex,
744     * this is just like {@link #draw(Texture, float[], int, int)} when used in other Batch implementations, but expects
745     * {@code spriteVertices} to have a length that is a multiple of 24 instead of 20.
746     * @param texture the Texture being drawn from; usually an atlas or some parent Texture with lots of TextureRegions
747     * @param spriteVertices vertices formatted as this class uses them; length should be a multiple of 24
748     * @param offset where to start drawing vertices from {@code spriteVertices}
749     * @param count how many vertices to draw from {@code spriteVertices} (24 vertices is one sprite)
750     */
751    public void drawExactly (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
752        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
753
754        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
755        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
756        if (texture != lastTexture)
757            switchTexture(texture);
758        else {
759            remainingVertices -= idx;
760            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
761                flush();
762                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
763            }
764        }
765        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
766
767        System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
768        idx += copyCount;
769        count -= copyCount;
770        while (count > 0) {
771            offset += copyCount;
772            flush();
773            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
774            System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
775            idx += copyCount;
776            count -= copyCount;
777        }
778    }
779
780    @Override
781    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y) {
782        draw(region, x, y, region.getRegionWidth(), region.getRegionHeight());
783    }
784
785    @Override
786    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
787        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
788
789        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
790
791        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
792        if (texture != lastTexture) {
793            switchTexture(texture);
794        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
795            flush();
796        }
797        final float fx2 = x + width;
798        final float fy2 = y + height;
799        final float u = region.getU();
800        final float v = region.getV2();
801        final float u2 = region.getU2();
802        final float v2 = region.getV();
803
804        final float color = this.color;
805        final float tweak = this.tweak;
806        final int idx = this.idx;
807        vertices[idx] = x;
808        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
809        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
810        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
811        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
812        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
813
814        vertices[idx + 6] = x;
815        vertices[idx + 7] = fy2;
816        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
817        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
818        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
819        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
820
821        vertices[idx + 12] = fx2;
822        vertices[idx + 13] = fy2;
823        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
824        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
825        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
826        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
827
828        vertices[idx + 18] = fx2;
829        vertices[idx + 19] = y;
830        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
831        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
832        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
833        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
834        this.idx = idx + 24;
835    }
836
837    @Override
838    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
839                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation) {
840        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
841
842        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
843
844        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
845        if (texture != lastTexture) {
846            switchTexture(texture);
847        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
848            flush();
849
850        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
851        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
852        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
853        float fx = -originX;
854        float fy = -originY;
855        float fx2 = width - originX;
856        float fy2 = height - originY;
857
858        // scale
859        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
860            fx *= scaleX;
861            fy *= scaleY;
862            fx2 *= scaleX;
863            fy2 *= scaleY;
864        }
865
866        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
867        final float p1x = fx;
868        final float p1y = fy;
869        final float p2x = fx;
870        final float p2y = fy2;
871        final float p3x = fx2;
872        final float p3y = fy2;
873        final float p4x = fx2;
874        final float p4y = fy;
875
876        float x1;
877        float y1;
878        float x2;
879        float y2;
880        float x3;
881        float y3;
882        float x4;
883        float y4;
884
885        // rotate
886        if (rotation != 0) {
887            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
888            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
889
890            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
891            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
892
893            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
894            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
895
896            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
897            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
898
899            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
900            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
901        } else {
902            x1 = p1x;
903            y1 = p1y;
904
905            x2 = p2x;
906            y2 = p2y;
907
908            x3 = p3x;
909            y3 = p3y;
910
911            x4 = p4x;
912            y4 = p4y;
913        }
914
915        x1 += worldOriginX;
916        y1 += worldOriginY;
917        x2 += worldOriginX;
918        y2 += worldOriginY;
919        x3 += worldOriginX;
920        y3 += worldOriginY;
921        x4 += worldOriginX;
922        y4 += worldOriginY;
923
924        final float u = region.getU();
925        final float v = region.getV2();
926        final float u2 = region.getU2();
927        final float v2 = region.getV();
928
929        final float color = this.color;
930        final float tweak = this.tweak;
931        final int idx = this.idx;
932        vertices[idx] = x1;
933        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
934        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
935        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
936        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
937        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
938
939        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
940        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
941        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
942        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
943        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
944        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
945
946        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
947        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
948        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
949        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
950        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
951        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
952
953        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
954        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
955        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
956        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
957        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
958        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
959        this.idx = idx + 24;
960    }
961
962    @Override
963    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
964                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation, boolean clockwise) {
965        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
966
967        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
968
969        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
970        if (texture != lastTexture) {
971            switchTexture(texture);
972        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
973            flush();
974
975        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
976        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
977        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
978        float fx = -originX;
979        float fy = -originY;
980        float fx2 = width - originX;
981        float fy2 = height - originY;
982
983        // scale
984        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
985            fx *= scaleX;
986            fy *= scaleY;
987            fx2 *= scaleX;
988            fy2 *= scaleY;
989        }
990
991        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
992        final float p1x = fx;
993        final float p1y = fy;
994        final float p2x = fx;
995        final float p2y = fy2;
996        final float p3x = fx2;
997        final float p3y = fy2;
998        final float p4x = fx2;
999        final float p4y = fy;
1000
1001        float x1;
1002        float y1;
1003        float x2;
1004        float y2;
1005        float x3;
1006        float y3;
1007        float x4;
1008        float y4;
1009
1010        // rotate
1011        if (rotation != 0) {
1012            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
1013            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
1014
1015            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
1016            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
1017
1018            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
1019            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
1020
1021            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
1022            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
1023
1024            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
1025            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
1026        } else {
1027            x1 = p1x;
1028            y1 = p1y;
1029
1030            x2 = p2x;
1031            y2 = p2y;
1032
1033            x3 = p3x;
1034            y3 = p3y;
1035
1036            x4 = p4x;
1037            y4 = p4y;
1038        }
1039
1040        x1 += worldOriginX;
1041        y1 += worldOriginY;
1042        x2 += worldOriginX;
1043        y2 += worldOriginY;
1044        x3 += worldOriginX;
1045        y3 += worldOriginY;
1046        x4 += worldOriginX;
1047        y4 += worldOriginY;
1048
1049        float u1, v1, u2, v2, u3, v3, u4, v4;
1050        if (clockwise) {
1051            u1 = region.getU2();
1052            v1 = region.getV2();
1053            u2 = region.getU();
1054            v2 = region.getV2();
1055            u3 = region.getU();
1056            v3 = region.getV();
1057            u4 = region.getU2();
1058            v4 = region.getV();
1059        } else {
1060            u1 = region.getU();
1061            v1 = region.getV();
1062            u2 = region.getU2();
1063            v2 = region.getV();
1064            u3 = region.getU2();
1065            v3 = region.getV2();
1066            u4 = region.getU();
1067            v4 = region.getV2();
1068        }
1069
1070        final float color = this.color;
1071        final float tweak = this.tweak;
1072        final int idx = this.idx;
1073        vertices[idx] = x1;
1074        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
1075        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
1076        vertices[idx + 3] = u1;
1077        vertices[idx + 4] = v1;
1078        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
1079
1080        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
1081        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
1082        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
1083        vertices[idx + 9] = u2;
1084        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
1085        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
1086
1087        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
1088        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
1089        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
1090        vertices[idx + 15] = u3;
1091        vertices[idx + 16] = v3;
1092        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
1093
1094        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
1095        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
1096        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
1097        vertices[idx + 21] = u4;
1098        vertices[idx + 22] = v4;
1099        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
1100        this.idx = idx + 24;
1101    }
1102
1103    @Override
1104    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float width, float height, Affine2 transform) {
1105        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("ColorfulBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
1106
1107        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
1108
1109        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
1110        if (texture != lastTexture) {
1111            switchTexture(texture);
1112        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
1113            flush();
1114        }
1115
1116        // construct corner points
1117        float x1 = transform.m02;
1118        float y1 = transform.m12;
1119        float x2 = transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
1120        float y2 = transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
1121        float x3 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
1122        float y3 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
1123        float x4 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m02;
1124        float y4 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m12;
1125
1126        float u = region.getU();
1127        float v = region.getV2();
1128        float u2 = region.getV2();
1129        float v2 = region.getV();
1130
1131        final float color = this.color;
1132        final float tweak = this.tweak;
1133        final int idx = this.idx;
1134        vertices[idx] = x1;
1135        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
1136        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
1137        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
1138        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
1139        vertices[idx + 5] = tweak;
1140
1141        vertices[idx + 6] = x2;
1142        vertices[idx + 7] = y2;
1143        vertices[idx + 8] = color;
1144        vertices[idx + 9] = u;
1145        vertices[idx + 10] = v2;
1146        vertices[idx + 11] = tweak;
1147
1148        vertices[idx + 12] = x3;
1149        vertices[idx + 13] = y3;
1150        vertices[idx + 14] = color;
1151        vertices[idx + 15] = u2;
1152        vertices[idx + 16] = v2;
1153        vertices[idx + 17] = tweak;
1154
1155        vertices[idx + 18] = x4;
1156        vertices[idx + 19] = y4;
1157        vertices[idx + 20] = color;
1158        vertices[idx + 21] = u2;
1159        vertices[idx + 22] = v;
1160        vertices[idx + 23] = tweak;
1161        this.idx = idx + 24;
1162    }
1163
1164    @SuppressWarnings("RedundantCast") // These casts are absolutely not redundant! Java 9 changed Buffer ABI.
1165    @Override
1166    public void flush () {
1167        if (idx == 0) return;
1168
1169        renderCalls++;
1170        totalRenderCalls++;
1171        int spritesInBatch = idx / SPRITE_SIZE;
1172        if (spritesInBatch > maxSpritesInBatch) maxSpritesInBatch = spritesInBatch;
1173        int count = spritesInBatch * 6;
1174
1175        lastTexture.bind();
1176        Mesh mesh = this.mesh;
1177        mesh.setVertices(vertices, 0, idx);
1178        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).position(0);
1179        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).limit(count);
1180
1181        if (blendingDisabled) {
1182            Gdx.gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1183        } else {
1184            Gdx.gl.glEnable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1185            if (blendSrcFunc != -1) Gdx.gl.glBlendFuncSeparate(blendSrcFunc, blendDstFunc, blendSrcFuncAlpha, blendDstFuncAlpha);
1186        }
1187
1188        mesh.render(customShader != null ? customShader : shader, GL20.GL_TRIANGLES, 0, count);
1189
1190        idx = 0;
1191    }
1192
1193    @Override
1194    public void disableBlending () {
1195        if (blendingDisabled) return;
1196        flush();
1197        blendingDisabled = true;
1198    }
1199
1200    @Override
1201    public void enableBlending () {
1202        if (!blendingDisabled) return;
1203        flush();
1204        blendingDisabled = false;
1205    }
1206
1207    @Override
1208    public void setBlendFunction (int srcFunc, int dstFunc) {
1209        setBlendFunctionSeparate(srcFunc, dstFunc, srcFunc, dstFunc);
1210    }
1211
1212    @Override
1213    public void setBlendFunctionSeparate(int srcFuncColor, int dstFuncColor, int srcFuncAlpha, int dstFuncAlpha) {
1214        if (blendSrcFunc == srcFuncColor && blendDstFunc == dstFuncColor && blendSrcFuncAlpha == srcFuncAlpha && blendDstFuncAlpha == dstFuncAlpha) return;
1215        flush();
1216        blendSrcFunc = srcFuncColor;
1217        blendDstFunc = dstFuncColor;
1218        blendSrcFuncAlpha = srcFuncAlpha;
1219        blendDstFuncAlpha = dstFuncAlpha;
1220    }
1221
1222    @Override
1223    public int getBlendSrcFunc () {
1224        return blendSrcFunc;
1225    }
1226
1227    @Override
1228    public int getBlendDstFunc () {
1229        return blendDstFunc;
1230    }
1231
1232    @Override
1233    public int getBlendSrcFuncAlpha() {
1234        return blendSrcFuncAlpha;
1235    }
1236
1237    @Override
1238    public int getBlendDstFuncAlpha() {
1239        return blendDstFuncAlpha;
1240    }
1241
1242    @Override
1243    public void dispose () {
1244        mesh.dispose();
1245        if (ownsShader && shader != null) shader.dispose();
1246    }
1247
1248    @Override
1249    public Matrix4 getProjectionMatrix () {
1250        return projectionMatrix;
1251    }
1252
1253    @Override
1254    public Matrix4 getTransformMatrix () {
1255        return transformMatrix;
1256    }
1257
1258    @Override
1259    public void setProjectionMatrix (Matrix4 projection) {
1260        if (drawing) flush();
1261        projectionMatrix.set(projection);
1262        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1263    }
1264
1265    @Override
1266    public void setTransformMatrix (Matrix4 transform) {
1267        if (drawing) flush();
1268        transformMatrix.set(transform);
1269        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1270    }
1271
1272    protected void setupMatrices () {
1273        combinedMatrix.set(projectionMatrix).mul(transformMatrix);
1274        if (customShader != null) {
1275            customShader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1276            customShader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1277        } else {
1278            shader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1279            shader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1280        }
1281    }
1282
1283    protected void switchTexture (Texture texture) {
1284        flush();
1285        lastTexture = texture;
1286        invTexWidth = 1.0f / texture.getWidth();
1287        invTexHeight = 1.0f / texture.getHeight();
1288    }
1289
1290    @Override
1291    public void setShader (ShaderProgram shader) {
1292        if (drawing) {
1293            flush();
1294        }
1295        customShader = shader;
1296        if (drawing) {
1297            if (customShader != null)
1298                customShader.bind();
1299            else
1300                this.shader.bind();
1301            setupMatrices();
1302        }
1303    }
1304
1305    @Override
1306    public ShaderProgram getShader () {
1307        if (customShader == null) {
1308            return shader;
1309        }
1310        return customShader;
1311    }
1312
1313    @Override
1314    public boolean isBlendingEnabled () {
1315        return !blendingDisabled;
1316    }
1317
1318    public boolean isDrawing () {
1319        return drawing;
1320    }
1321    static public final int X1 = 0;
1322    static public final int Y1 = 1;
1323    static public final int C1 = 2;
1324    static public final int U1 = 3;
1325    static public final int V1 = 4;
1326    static public final int T1 = 5;
1327    static public final int X2 = 6;
1328    static public final int Y2 = 7;
1329    static public final int C2 = 8;
1330    static public final int U2 = 9;
1331    static public final int V2 = 10;
1332    static public final int T2 = 11;
1333    static public final int X3 = 12;
1334    static public final int Y3 = 13;
1335    static public final int C3 = 14;
1336    static public final int U3 = 15;
1337    static public final int V3 = 16;
1338    static public final int T3 = 17;
1339    static public final int X4 = 18;
1340    static public final int Y4 = 19;
1341    static public final int C4 = 20;
1342    static public final int U4 = 21;
1343    static public final int V4 = 22;
1344    static public final int T4 = 23;
1345}
